GaussianHMM —

class Emitter(args: ModelArgs)[source]¶

Bases: Module

Parameterizes the Gaussian observation likelihood p(y_t | z_t, x_t)

forward(z_t, x_t)[source]¶

Given the latent z at a particular time step t and the input x at time step t, we return the mean and variance of the Gaussian distribution p(y_t|z_t, x_t)

training: bool¶
class GatedTransition(args: ModelArgs)[source]¶

Bases: Module

Parameterizes the dynamics of the latent variables z_t

forward(z_t, x_t)[source]¶

Given the latent z at a particular time step t and the input x at time step t, we return the parameters for the Gaussian distribution p(z_t | z_{t-1}, x_t)

training: bool¶

DeepMarkovModel —

class Combiner(args: ModelArgs)[source]¶

Bases: Module

Combines the previous hidden state z_{t-1} and the current input x_t to produce the hidden state h_t, which is used by the emitter and transition networks.

forward(z_prev, rnn_input)[source]¶
